String.string: We'll leave the guards in chaos!
It's stunk up our air long enough.
How did this filth get inside?
Guards, to me! Enemies in the tower!
Eliminate Durzured and Vardas. [You must select Ebon Tower (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Report back to Kesarik near the Ebon Tower.
